channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Horror Comedy 'The Toxic Avenger’ Gets Streaming Date
item.description: "The Toxic Avenger," a remake of the classic horror comedy starring Peter Dinklage, Kevin Bacon, Elijah Wood and Jacob Tremblay, is coming soon to dig...

item.title: CrowdStrike Ushers In The Agentic Era Of Cybersecurity
item.description: CrowdStrike’s Fal.Con 2025 unveiled the Agentic Security Platform, AI agents, and new partnerships to move cybersecurity defenses to proactive, intell...

item.title: Apple Releases iOS 18.7: Urgent iPhone Update For Users Who Don’t Want iOS 26
item.description: Alongside iOS 26, there’s another update available for those users who don’t want to make the leap: iOS 18.7.

item.title: Moving From Reactive Defense To Proactive Foresight
item.description: AI-powered predictive security shifts cyber defense from reaction to foresight, helping enterprises anticipate risks, cut alerts, and protect data.

item.title: In AI, No Data Is Ever Cold
item.description: At the 2025 SNIA SDC Hammerspace’s David Flynn presented the concept for a Linux NFS-based Open Flash Platform that is needed for modern AI workflows.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.

item.title: New post

item.title: Often give in

item.title: Kinds of reckless

item.title: No time?
